string-array.name: hymn_content
string-array.item:
1.Hatina musha panyika
 " "Hatifari kuva pano
 " "Zvinofadza mweya yedu
 " "Kutsvaga musha unouya
 " "Kutsvaga musha unouya
 

2. Hatina musha panyika
 " "Tinoda musha uri kure
 " "Zita rawo iZion
 " "Unopenya nguva dzose
 " "Unopenya nguva dzose
 

3. Musha une runyararo
 " "Vafambi vachazorora
 " "Dai ndine mapapiro
 " "Ndaiuya ndizorore
 " "Ndaiuya ndizorore
 

4. Mweya wangu chinyarara
 " "Mwari anoziva nguva
 " "Achaita kuda kwake
 " "Iye wandopa zororo
 " "Iye wandopa zororo

1.Would you be free from your burden of sin
 " "There is power in the blood, power in the blood
 " "Would you o'er evil a victory to win
 " "There is wonderful power in the blood
 

Chorus
 " "There is power, wonder working power
 " "In the blood of the lamb, there is power,power 
 " "Wonder working power in the precious blood of the lamb
 

2. Would you be free from your pasiion and pride
 " "There is power in the blood, power in the blood
 " "Come for a cleansing to Calvary's tide
 " "There is wonderful power in the blood
 

3. Would you be whiter, much whiter than the snow
 " "There is power in the blood, power in the blood
 " "Sin stains are in its life giving flow
 " "There is wonderful power in the blood
 

4. Would you do service for Jesus your king
 " "There is power in the blood, power in the blood
 " "Would you live daily, His praises to sing
 " "There is wonderful power in the blood

1.Sewakhile enhlizi 'weni,
 " "Umhlobo'wam'
 " "Nguy'omkhul' ezihlotsheni
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Ngoba nguy' owangimela,
 " "La ngilahlwe ngokwempela
 " "Ngal'uthando wangifela,
 " "Lomhlobo wam'
 

2. Wabe kad' engithandile'
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Ngisenguye omdelile
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Nxa ukuona kwami kwanda
 " "Weza wena wanginqanda,
 " "Ngisemubi wangithanda
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 

3. Wazisus izono zami
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Naz' izinyembezi zami,
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Nxa ngiduka endleleni
 " "Unyenyeza enhlizi' weni
 " "Ungivusa emoyeni
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 

4. Uyathwai' umthwalo wam',
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Uthi, wongithwala wami
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Wayehlatswa njengemvana
 " "Az 'angenz owakh' uMntwana
 " "Yek' inhlanhla yokwazana
 " "Nomhlobo wam'
 
 5. Bonkie-ke bangamfumana
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Unomusa, uyaphana
 " "Umhlobo wam'
 " "Yonk' eminye imihlobo
 " "Ingadinwa yen'uqobo
 " "Nguye namhla njengezolo
 " "Nomhlobo wam'
